column4: can anybody give me some ideas as to why my ubuntu can't access the internet? its a fresh install of 9.0.4 and connected to a LAN newtork. It finds the connection and says successful, but can't get ott he internet. Yet, when I plus this vista machine into it, it connects just fine and can get on the web. Any ideas?
i can on this machine, but the ubuntu one can't get any access to the web or anything of the sort
